title: Xiao Jiu - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Betrayal   Bodyguards   Childhood Love   Clever Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Family Conflict   Marriage   Misunderstandings   Older Love Interests   Politics   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Royalty   Smart Couple   Strong Love Interests   Unconditional Love   Unrequited Love
author: Xu Banxian   许半仙
description: Though Xiao Jiu is the youngest among the nine princes, he is also the most talented among them. However, all his brains is spent on trying to get closer to Yan-daren. Yan-daren is cold and aloof, but the cute little prince will do all he can to break his ice.>
